Articles.Content:
Make a space plane, or a rocket to land the stock VTOL in the space plane hangar and land on Duna safely. Also make the rocket, or space plane out of stock parts. Have fun!

Here are the rules for easy reading.

1. you must use the stock VTOL included in the game (SPH)

2. you must land on Duna you can also land on Eve.

3. if you need to change how the Vtol lands you can.

Edited September 27, 2012 by southernarmy
